verses.text: How hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w covered|strong="H5743"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with a \w cloud|strong="H5743"\w* in his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \add and\add* cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* unto the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* the \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not his \w footstool|strong="H1916"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*!

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* all the \w habitations|strong="H4999"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and hath not \w pitied|strong="H2550"\w*: he hath thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w* in his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* the strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; he hath brought \add them\add* \w down|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: he hath \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft brought…: Heb. made to touch\f*

He hath cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w* in \add his\add* \w fierce|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* all the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: he hath \w drawn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w* his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, and he \w burned|strong="H1197"\w* against \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* like a \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add which\add* \w devoureth|strong="H0398"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

He hath \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* his \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* like an \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: he \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* with his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* as an \w adversary|strong="H6862"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* all \add that were\add* \w pleasant|strong="H4261"\w* to the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: he poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* his \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft all…: Heb. all the desirable of the eye\f*

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* was as an \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: he hath swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, he hath swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* all her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*: he hath \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* his strong \w holds|strong="H4013"\w*, and hath \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* in the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w mourning|strong="H8386"\w* and \w lamentation|strong="H0592"\w*.

And he hath violently taken \w away|strong="H2554"\w* his \w tabernacle|strong="H7900"\w*, as \add if it were of\add* a \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*: he hath \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* his places of the \w assembly|strong="H4150"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath caused the solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* and \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* to be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and hath \w despised|strong="H5006"\w* in the \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft tabernacle: or, hedge\f*

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w* his \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, he hath \w abhorred|strong="H5010"\w* his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, he hath given \w up|strong="H5462"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* of her \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*; they have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* a \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of a solemn \w feast|strong="H4150"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft given up: Heb. shut up\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w purposed|strong="H2803"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: he hath stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* a \w line|strong="H6957"\w*, he hath not \w withdrawn|strong="H7725"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from \w destroying|strong="H1104"\w*: therefore he made the \w rampart|strong="H2426"\w* and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* to \w lament|strong="H0056"\w*; they \w languished|strong="H0535"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft destroying: Heb. swallowing up\f*

Her \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* are \w sunk|strong="H2883"\w* into the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; he hath \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* and \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* her \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*: her \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and her \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \add are\add* among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \add is\add* no \add more;\add* her \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* also \w find|strong="H4672"\w* no \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \add and\add* keep \w silence|strong="H1826"\w*: they have cast \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*; they have \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* themselves with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*: the \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* hang \w down|strong="H3381"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

Mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* do \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* with \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* are \w troubled|strong="H2560"\w*, my \w liver|strong="H3516"\w* is \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, for the \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; because the \w children|strong="H5768"\w* and the \w sucklings|strong="H3243"\w* \w swoon|strong="H5848"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H7151"\w*.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft swoon: or, faint\f*

They \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to their \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w*, Where \add is\add* \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*? when they \w swooned|strong="H5848"\w* as the \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, when their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* was poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* into their \w mothers’|strong="H0517"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

What thing shall I take to \w witness|strong="H5749"\w* for thee? what \w thing|strong="H4100"\w* shall I \w liken|strong="H1819"\w* to thee, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*? what shall I \w equal|strong="H7737"\w* to thee, that I may \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* thee, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*? for thy \w breach|strong="H7667"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* like the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: who can \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* thee?

Thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* have \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* and foolish \w things|strong="H8602"\w* for thee: and they have not \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, to turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*; but have \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* for thee \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w burdens|strong="H4864"\w* and causes of \w banishment|strong="H4065"\w*.

All that \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by \w clap|strong="H5606"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* at \w thee|strong="H1870"\w*; they \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* and \w wag|strong="H5128"\w* their \w head|strong="H7218"\w* at the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \add saying, Is\add* this the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \add men\add* \w call|strong="H0559"\w* The \w perfection|strong="H3632"\w* of \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, The \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?\f + \fr 2.15 \ft by: Heb. by the way\f*

All thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* have \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* against thee: they \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* and \w gnash|strong="H2786"\w* the \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*: they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We have swallowed \add her\add* \w up|strong="H1104"\w*: \w certainly|strong="H0389"\w* this \add is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that we looked \w for|strong="H6960"\w*; we have \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add that\add* which he had \w devised|strong="H2161"\w*; he hath \w fulfilled|strong="H1214"\w* his \w word|strong="H0565"\w* that he had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*: he hath thrown \w down|strong="H2040"\w*, and hath not \w pitied|strong="H2550"\w*: and he hath caused \add thine\add* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over thee, he hath set \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of thine \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*.

Their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, O \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, let \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* run \w down|strong="H3381"\w* like a \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thyself no \w rest|strong="H6314"\w*; let not the \w apple|strong="H1323"\w* of thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w cease|strong="H1826"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, cry \w out|strong="H7442"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: in the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w watches|strong="H0821"\w* pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* like \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*: lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* toward him for the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of thy young \w children|strong="H5768"\w*, that \w faint|strong="H5848"\w* for \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of every \w street|strong="H2351"\w*.

¶ \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w consider|strong="H5027"\w* to whom thou hast \w done|strong="H5953"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w*. Shall the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, \add and\add* \w children|strong="H5768"\w* of a span \w long|strong="H2949"\w*? shall the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* be \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* in the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*?\f + \fr 2.20 \ft of a span…: or, swaddled with their hands?\f*

The \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* on the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*: my \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* and my young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; thou hast \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \add them\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*; thou hast \w killed|strong="H2873"\w*, \add and\add* not \w pitied|strong="H2550"\w*.

Thou hast \w called|strong="H7121"\w* as in a \w solemn|strong="H4150"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* my \w terrors|strong="H4032"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, so that in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* none \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w* nor \w remained|strong="H8300"\w*: those that I have \w swaddled|strong="H2946"\w* and brought \w up|strong="H7235"\w* hath mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.
